product_description: High-Sensitivity Wall Scanner & Metal Detector – Detects Studs, Pipes, Wires, and More with Reliable Precision Upgrade your project confidence with the WPP123 Wall Scanner & Stud Finder, a multifunctional detection tool designed to help you quickly locate metal, studs, and live AC wires hidden behind walls, ceilings, and floors. Built for DIYers and professionals alike, this scanner helps prevent drilling mistakes and identify hidden hazards before you work. 🧠 Important Note for Best Results: Always start by holding the device flat on an empty wall area and pressing the calibration button before scanning. Calibration ensures accurate readings. Detection range may vary slightly depending on wall thickness, density, or material type (e.g., reinforced concrete). 🔧 Product Highlights: 🔔 Dual Sound & Visual Alerts Instantly identify hidden objects through both audible beeps and LED indicator lights—perfect for loud job sites or dimly lit areas. 🎯 High-Accuracy Detection for Multiple Materials Precisely locates metal pipes, wood studs, rebar, and live AC wires behind drywall, plaster, and concrete—ideal for accurate and safe drilling or renovation work. 🛠️ Adjustable Sensitivity for Every Job Easily fine-tune detection depth and sensitivity to match different wall types and materials, giving you control and flexibility across multiple surfaces. 👷 Lightweight, Ergonomic Design Built for comfort and control, reducing hand fatigue during extended use—perfect for both homeowners and professionals. 🔌 3-in-1 Versatility Functions as a stud finder, AC wire detector, and metal locator—a must-have multifunction tool for safe and confident home improvement projects.
